title: unix: setresuid(2) and setresgid(2) unimplemented on OpenBSD/FreeBSD/DragonflyBSD
body:
What does 'go version' print?
go version1.2.1 openbsd/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. Try to use syscall.Setresuid() in a go package

What happened?
Package cannot build

What should have happened instead?
Package builds, and syscall works as expected

Please provide any additional information below.
